name: Shiba Adventure: 2D Platformer for Android
description:
This is my first comercial project i published in mid 2019. The idea was to make a simple plataformer game, with levels and score system for Google Play Store, implementing Ads as the main revenue method.

The game was developed and published in two weeks, and after that i made an expansion with 6 new levels.

The idea behind this project for me was to learn how the google play store environment works, and how to implement ads.

Concept Art and Game Design:

The concept is about a Shiba Inu dog running trough landscapes and avoiding obstacles.

The main goal is to reach the end of every level, and to unlock all the three stars of each level, for unlock the starts you need to gather all the food of the map, there is two sprites for the food: pizza and meat.

The Game Mechanics:

The game has only one very simple mechanic that is make the dog jump when you press the screen.

The soundtrack was made by myself using garageband.
